name: 2 WEEK INTRO
description:
Flexible Schedule: Book into multiple classes each day.
Unlimited access to regular classes.
Special discounts to specialty classes.
Pack activation expiration is 60 days from date of purchase.
Cancellation Policy: Cancel up to 12 hours before class to avoid any penalties.

name: DAY PASS
description:
Day Pass activation expiration is 60 days from date of purchase.
Cancellation Policy: Cancel up to 12 hours before class otherwise class is considered taken.

name: 15 CLASS PACK
description:
Access to any regular class on schedule.
Special discounts to specialty classes.
Pass can be shared without limits.
Cancellation Policy: Cancel up to 12 hours before class otherwise class is considered taken.

name: MEMBER-DAY PASS
description:
Access to 1 class. Advanced booking only.
For members with active class pack only.
Not applicable for use with class packs.
Weekly pole fitness lessons on Saturdays, 4pm to 5:15pm.

name: NON-MEMBER DAY PASS SINGLE CLASS
description:
Access to 1 class. Advanced booking only.
Weekly pole fitness lessons on Saturdays, 4pm to 5:15pm.

name: 6-CLASS MEMBER PACK
description:
Advanced booking only.
Weekly pole fitness lessons on Saturdays, 4pm to 5:15pm.
Pack can be shared without limits.

name: MEMBER MEDITATION
description:
Access to 1 class. By booking only.
For members with active class packs only.
Not applicable for use with class packs.
Weekly guided sessions on Thursdays at 6 pm and Fridays at 7 pm.

name: NON-MEMBER MEDITATION
description:
Access to 1 class. By booking only.
Weekly guided sessions on Thursdays at 6 pm and Fridays at 7 pm.
